Name: Candy Smash VR
About the game: Satisfy your hacking and slashing needs in colorful and mushy candy world. Crush those flying candies and fruits with candy canes and make Pappa Candy happy! Avoid those nasty time bombs at all cost! Experience the most fun you can have in virtual CandyLand. More features to come on the request of player feedback! Requires HTC Vive.
